site.description: This is the global update site for all ORG Eclipse features.

category-def.name: ORG Core
category-def.label: ORG Core
category-def.description: Core feature used by other ORG features. This is of little interest to users on its own.

category-def.name: ORG User Features
category-def.label: ORG User Features
category-def.description: These are the features containing functionalities of interest to users of the Eclipse platform.

category-def.name: ORG Add-ons and samples
category-def.label: ORG Add-ons and samples
category-def.description: These are features adding customized extensions and samples to ORG features
